title: Employee salary batch adjustment
content: If you have web service, please follow the steps mentioned in this article.Click on Employees,Choose Wage Adjustments (Batch),Choose the search method you want to use: By enterprise, OR by service/department, OR by Last Name, First name. You can also filter your selection by wage greater or less, Select the Adjustment details,Enter the amount or percentage % of upward or downward adjustment,Click on Search,Check the affected employees. Use  to select all,Click on Save.To check if the hourly rate has changed in the Employee's file: Access the Employee file > Ré=munérationIf you click on it, you can see the other adjustment history for this folder.Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
